name: French Learning Game
description:
A french learning game made during the TUDublinIMPACT game jam in 2021! Tasked with making a game for French Grammar Resources. 

Play as Didier and learn some new basic french words!

Team:

  • Evan Williams
  • Tochi Ugochukwu
  • Evan Harris
  • John Francis Gillman

Song - New York Baguette
